title: A Troubled Mind And An Open Door
description:
When God opens a door, nobody can shut it. In “A Troubled Mind And An Open Door,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church teaches us that, while the enemy may not be able to close doors, he can try to keep us from walking through them.

If you’ve just made a decision for Christ, please respond HERE: http://ele.vc/7vUtpo
